body.name: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
features: Get ready to upgrade your activewear game with our pack of Men's Dry Fit Shorts! Our design features a 9-inch inseam and a stretchy material that allows for full range of motion, beating out the competition in both style and comfort.
Say goodbye to soaking wet shorts during intense workouts, with our moisture-wicking Dry Fit technology. You'll stay cool, comfortable, and confident no matter what activity you're doing.
Our shorts feature a blend of polyester and spandex, providing a lightweight, breathable and quick-drying experience. Perfect for basketball, soccer, running, or any other sport or workout.
Available in classic black, white, navy blue, and gray, these shorts are perfect for any occasion. Whether you're running errands or hitting the gym, you'll look and feel your best.

At Real Essentials, our mission is to provide affordable, high-quality clothing options for hard-working families. We stand behind our products and are committed to ensuring that every customer is completely satisfied with their purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: For what they cost, I cannot possibly complain about the quality of these pants. They are very breathable and comfortable to wear when going to the gym, or when hanging out at home. 5 pairs was enough for me to have gym shorts for each day I go to the gym and I haven't had a single complaint about these shorts. The material seems like it might wear down/rip at some point within the next 2 years if I had to guess but for the price I can't really complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Blend of Comfort and Functionality - Men's Mesh Athletic Performance Gym Shorts Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Mesh Athletic Performance Gym Shorts with Pockets, and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. These shorts have quickly become my go-to choice for workouts and daily activities.First and foremost, the comfort level of these shorts is unparalleled. The mesh fabric is lightweight and breathable, ensuring that I stay cool and comfortable even during intense workouts. The airy feel of the material is perfect for hot summer days and high-intensity exercises.The fit is spot on. I ordered my usual size, and the shorts fit me perfectly, providing a comfortable and non-restrictive feel. The elastic waistband offers a secure yet flexible fit, allowing for a full range of motion during exercises.The addition of pockets is a game-changer. I love having the convenience of pockets to hold my essentials, such as my phone and keys, during my gym sessions. It eliminates the need for carrying a separate bag, streamlining my workouts and making them more enjoyable.The 5-pack option is fantastic value for money. I now have a variety of colors to choose from, and each pair is equally comfortable and well-made. The quality of the construction is evident, and I can tell that these shorts are built to withstand frequent use.Moreover, these shorts are not only great for the gym but also perfect for various activities and casual wear. Whether I'm running errands, playing sports, or simply lounging at home, these shorts are my reliable choice.Cleaning and maintaining these shorts is a breeze. They wash well, and the color and shape remain intact even after multiple washes.In conclusion, the Real Essentials Men's Mesh Athletic Performance Gym Shorts with Pockets are a must-have for any active individual. Their comfort, perfect fit, and functional design make them an excellent choice for workouts and daily wear. With the added bonus of pockets and the value of the 5-pack, this purchase has exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend these gym shorts to anyone in need of comfortable and versatile activewear. I am thrilled with my purchase and will definitely be buying more from Real Essentials in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for what you pay but they aren't the BEST quality.... but that's okay.
reviews.reviewText: I have two sets of these shorts, one I purchased in august of 2020 and one in august 2021. Clearly I went back to buy another set a year later so I must like them, and I do. They are priced INCREDIBLY well. At the time of the first purchase, I had just started playing sports again and needed lightweight shorts to cut and move in. These are DEFINITELY those shorts. They breath very well, they're comfortable enough that now I not only work out in them, I lounge around the house in them and go to sleep in them as well. They've held up pretty well to washing. I wash them on hot with powdered detergent and oxiclean powder and rinse them twice and then dry them on medium heat. They've probably gone through at least 100 washes thus far and I'm still wearing them. Yes, some of the seams have loose thread, yes some of them start to come off over time but they're $6 a short and none of them have unraveled to the point that there are any holes or they are unwearable, it's just something you would see when you look at the inner part of the waistband.The ONE weakness of these shorts is the pockets. I've had several that have started developing holes in the side seams of the pockets. Now it only started happening a year+ later and they've been beat up and washed many times so that's not quite so bad, but still it'll happen. I suspect this is more to do with how big and heavy phones are nowadays since it's always on my right pocket (where my phone goes) and started pretty much after I upgraded from an iphone 7 to an iphone 13 pro. But two years and 100+ aggressive washings later, only 3 out of 10 shorts have pocket holes and only one has a hole big enough that I'm scared to put my phone in the pocket.These are fantastic shorts and they could easily charge double. I plan to replace some of the original ones with a new set even now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great workout shorts
reviews.reviewText: These are great shorts. Very comfortable and fit well. Lightweight and breathable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Men's Shorts (package of 5)
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Different design on each. Has a loose elastic waist with a tie. Material is not thick. Only con really other than the drawstrings, is that the pockets are not deep at all. My phone sticks out & is definitely not secure enough to keep in these pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: You're getting what you paid for. It's cheap material but not cheaply made. The stitching doesn't rip easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Shorts Great Price
reviews.reviewText: These are my go to shorts for the gym. I am 5’9” and prefer to wear shorts that are right at knee cap level. These fit perfectly. I lived through the 80’s and will never wear short shorts again. The fabric is cool to the touch and moisture dissipates quickly. These do not snag as easily as other shorts I’ve owned but they will if they catch on something. Overall, I’m happy with my second purchase and will order them again.
la tela es delgada porque son para ejercitarse, pero en temporada de calor tambien puede servir para pijama o como ropa normal, tienen buen diseño y se ven bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great shorts my son lives in them True to size and a great fit. Lightweight and comfortable will be ordering some more. Good value for money and super quick delivery.
The quality is very poor. The seam stitching has started to come off on just two days usage.
Shorts bonitos ligeros y fresquitos...para dias de calor para estar en casa o hacer deporte...los bolsillos un poco pequeños...tallan bien

These shorts are super comfortable and good for the gym. The order was good except for the one short they sent that was the wrong size. Another important thing to mention is that when stretched, they are translucent since the fabric is not very thick. So make sure you use compression pants or dark undergarments beneath these shorts. Otherwise, they work well for exercises that need lots of flexibility, squatting, etc. They are also very comfortable to wear at home! I love this product and will probably order more in the future. Great money value and great quality. Very satisfied!
